data.title: It has everything
data.text:
We are snowbirds, arrived back in Florida and this library had every book and publication we needed.  It is clean, well run, and when you downsize and can't buy books any longer as no space to keep them it is perfect.

We don't take advantage of all the programs but they have something for everyone.  Thank you to all the staff who keeps this facility as well run as it is.

data.title: Best Library Ever
data.text: The library is gorgeous, with tons of computer space and dedicated teen and children's areas, not to mention a coffee shop on the ground floor, I love it. The staff is wonderful and extremely helpful, there are so many free classes available in all sorts of areas, and it's on a nice street.

data.title: No Complaints
data.text: Modern, lots of computers and open on Sundays!  Nice view, elevators, lots of eateries in the surrounding area but parking is not easy.

data.title: Nice experience
data.text: Staff extremely helpful.  Most books are in house, yet they are willing to borrow from other resources to accommodate you.

data.title: Wonderful Downtown City Library
data.text: Somewhat upstaged by the county library system, this city facility has a lot to offer in a very pleasant atmosphere.

data.title: Beautiful venue
data.text: The library used to be by the water but it is in its new beautiful building at 411 Clematis Street.  It's easy to obtain a library card and the collections of books, DVDs, CDs and more are extensive

data.title: I am torn...
data.text: Amazing, gorgeous building. All the books, movies, TV shows, magazines, reference materials you could ask for. But, homeless people hang out there a lot. So, the stench of BO and dirt just hangs in the air.

data.title: The Best Library ever!
data.text: Not only is this a fabulous library, it's an educational institution.   I've taken courses there, heard lectures, and of course, borrowed books and films.   The children's floor is something to see.   I brought a professional librarian for a visit because I thought she'd find it amazing.

data.title: Everything that you want in a library, even donuts!
data.text: This is a terrific library located right in downtown West Palm Beach.  Not always so easy to park on the street, but there is a garage next door.  Lots of books and many DVDs.  Also a Dunkin Donuts located on the first floor!  Always plenty of classes and shows.

user_location.name: West Palm Beach, Florida, United States

data.title: Not Just a Library
data.text:
This library has an entire floor just for children.  They can find books to read, find a spot to read, enjoy some hands on experiences doing simple projects or take part in whatever program is going on at the time.  It is definitely geared for little people.

Other adult programs are held at the library, so beyond the books, it's a beautiful place to broaden your horizons.

data.title: Quiet place near the busy Clematis street
data.text: I found interesting books to read, especially about local subjects. It is very easy to get to on public transport, we usually ride our bikes and there are good spots to park the bikes.

data.title: Great library!
data.text: Convenient downtown location on Clematis Street, four floors of books, resources, children's section and more.

data.title: Amazing Public Library
data.text: Having just moved to West Palm Beach, my daughter and I decided to check out the local library.  This is one of the best libraries I have ever been to.  The scope and breadth of program offerings and amenities is amazing.  The atmosphere is beautiful and the resources great.  So excited to be able to walk to this great library.

data.title: Lots of great freebies!
data.text: This is a great place. They offer free yoga classes on Saturday mornings, free book readings most days of the week, and the place is big, spacious, clean and visitor friendly, even for tourists. Free wi-fi and a great place to spend a rainy day in West Palm Beach.

data.title: Great library with special programs for the whole family!
data.text: We love going to this downtown West Palm library not only to check out books but to rent movies. We love the selection of movies and enjoy all of the special programs such as yoga, painting and singing classes among others!

data.title: Outstanding Public Library
data.text: Quite impressive library in the heart of downtown West Palm Beach. Not affiliated with the Palm Beach County Library System which is also quite good. 4 stories with dozens of free computers spread out over the entire building. Quiet but not morgue like, great place to get research done, read, peruse the classics, etc. Highly recommended. Impressive physical structure for those who enjoy architecture.

data.title: Great Library
data.text: This library has everything for young and old.  The children's floor has a homework area and a computer lab.  It is really well maintained.  This modern facility is one of the best that I have ever been to.

data.title: wonderful for children
data.text: My family loves this library.  The little ones especially love the children's floor.  It's perfect on a rainy day or when you need a change from sports.  The selection is huge and the physical layout is imaginative and cheerful.  We come for special events too.

data.title: Incredible Public Library with Fantastic Free Programs
data.text: Took a free art class which provided all materials. Friendly instructor took away my "painting intimidation" and I created a lovely acrylic canvas.

data.title: A favorite for the locals
data.text: If you're new to town or just visiting, you need to know that this is the best library in Palm Beach County. It's clean on the inside and family-friendly. The library hosts all sorts of interesting and exciting classes that you must check out (pun implied).
